scenario_text.value: What should I do? At this rate...
Don’t be so timid, Shuuji.

Who’s being timid?! I’m just trying to
consider the optimal strategy going forward.

We have to take the best course of action!
There can’t be any more sacrifices!
Yeah, I guess that’s true...
I...I have to do it. Otherwise...
Shuuji...

(This isn’t good. Responsibility is important
and all, but taking on too much won’t help.)

(Shuuji was never leadership material in the
first place, anyway.)

(Still, saying it straight won’t help. Maybe
in a roundabout way? Or offer to help?)
(What should I do?)
That doesn’t suit you.
You do your best.
Let me help, too.

You shouldn’t force yourself to do stuff that
doesn’t suit you, Shuuji.
...Um, excuse me?

I’d say you should ask the others for help,
and make things easy on your—
Are you saying I can’t hack it?!
What?

You think I’m not good at leading, or
rallying people together?! Is that it?!
No, that’s not—

You’re saying I should leave it to you—that
you can hack it?! That I’m, I’m—!
Chill out, Shuuji!
Shut up! I am “chill”!
Hyeek...
*huff*... *huff*...
Um, so...
...Sorry. I lost my head there for a second.

(Shuuji’s clearly upset. I really shouldn’t
have said that...)
You do your best.

It’s just that, your way of thinking’s a bit
different from the others, and—

...Hey, could you lay off the concern? It’s
weirding me out.

I can tell what you wanna say. “There’s no
point taking useless actions.”
C-come on, that’s not...
(Then again, I was thinking it.)

If you have something to say, then give it to
me straight.
...No, on second thought, don’t.

Let me help you out somehow, Shuuji. You’re
taking too much upon yourself.

Thank you... I appreciate the thought, but
I can’t ask you to do more.

If I’m being honest, I already rely on you
too much.
Huh, you think?
I get it, Takuma...
You think I’m unreliable, don’t you?
Wha’? No, I don’t think that at all!

It’s fine, I know it. I know everyone else
thinks the same.
Even so, I have things I have to do.

The mission I inherited from the professor.
And what’s more...
Shuuji...?
Ugh... I’m, I’m not worthless...

(Oh no, he’s talking to himself again... Back
in his own little world.)

...Please leave me alone. I don’t feel like
being around people right now.
Shuuji...
Don’t worry, I’ll be right by his side.
That means you, too! Go on, leave me alone!
...No way. I can’t leave you by yourself.

I said leave me alone!
I... I just...!
Shuuji... Look at me, Shuuji...
Oh man, poor Lopmon!
We should leave them alone, Agumon.
(That being said, I wonder if this is okay?)

(This reminds me of that time with Ryo, but
I don’t think yelling will do any good...)

(Well, he’ll be fine with Lopmon there.
...I’m sure of it.)
Please, leave me alone...
